name: Starry Knight Rayel
effectText: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Starry Knight" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Starry Knight" monster in your GY, except "Starry Knight Rayel"; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Starry Knight Rayel" once per turn.
